name: QMC6310 Unified
description:
A Unified Sensor driver for the QMC6310 magnetometer/compass IC from QST Corporation. The QMC6310 is a three-axis magnetic sensor with IÂ²C serial interface that integrates magnetic sensors and a signal condition ASIC into one silicon chip.
The library requires the `Adafruit Unified Sensor`.
keywords: magnetometer, I2C, magsensor, QMC6310, Adafruit, Unified Sensor
